tool_description: Creates new bounding box annotations on images with specified coordinates, class labels, and metadata for object detection tasks.

image_id.description: Unique identifier of the target image

bbox_coordinates.description: Bounding box coordinates as [x_min, y_min, x_max, y_max]

class_name.description: Object class name for this annotation

annotator_id.description: Identifier of the person creating the annotation

annotation_notes.description: Optional notes or comments about this annotation

is_difficult.description: Flag indicating if object is difficult to detect

is_occluded.description: Flag indicating if object is partially occluded

is_truncated.description: Flag indicating if object extends beyond image boundaries

error_messages: Invalid image_id: Image identifier must be non-empty and correspond to a loaded image. Verify the image_id exists.
Invalid bbox_coordinates: Must provide exactly 4 numbers [x_min, y_min, x_max, y_max] with x_min < x_max and y_min < y_max.
Coordinates out of bounds: Bounding box coordinates must be within image dimensions. Check coordinate values against image size.
Invalid class_name: Class name must be non-empty and exist in project class configuration. Verify class is defined.
Invalid confidence_score: Score must be between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive. Adjust confidence_score value.
Missing annotator_id: Annotator identifier is required for tracking. Provide a valid annotator_id.
Empty annotation: Bounding box area is too small (< 1 pixel). Ensure meaningful annotation size.
usage: Provide image_id, bbox_coordinates array [x_min, y_min, x_max, y_max], class_name, and annotator_id. Optionally set confidence_score, annotation_notes, and object flags. Returns created annotation details.

annotation_id.description: Unique identifier for the created annotation

bbox_area.description: Calculated area of the bounding box in pixels

annotation_summary.description: Summary description of the created annotation
